meanings.definition: A person who holds a position of authority or leadership.
meanings.sent1: The topkick of the team made sure everyone followed the rules.
meanings.sent2: The topkick of the company was respected by all employees.
meanings.sent3: The topkick of the school organized a fun field trip for the students.
meanings.sent4: She was the topkick of the dance group, leading them to victory in competitions.
meanings.sent5: The topkick of the club inspired others with their strong leadership skills.

meanings.definition: To be at the highest point or rank.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, he finally managed to topkick in his career.
meanings.sent2: The athlete trained hard to topkick in the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The plant grew so tall that it seemed to topkick over the fence.
meanings.sent4: Her grades continued to topkick, impressing her teachers and parents.
meanings.sent5: The rocket soared high, aiming to topkick into outer space.
